When the investigator deals damage with a studied strike, the target must succeed at a Fortitude save (DC = 10 + 1/2 the investigatorâ€™s class level + her Intelligence modifier) or be unable to speak (even for verbal components) for 1d4+1 rounds. A successful save reduces the duration to 1 round. This talent has no effect on creatures immune to critical hits.

An investigator must be at least 15th level to select this talent.
